attributes.action: Increase the cricketing facilities in the East End of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand that the British Government does more to provide cricketing facilities within the inner east end of London.  We believe that the government is failing to provide adequate sporting and social programmes in the area, which is leading to societal decay.  Whats more, the area has a large basis of asian residents, all of whom are avid supporters of the sport.
attributes.creator_name: Rev D A Nichols, Laird of Glencairn
